itunes:subtitle: Derek is joined by Stacy and Owen to talk about their first jobs they held as teenagers, Derek explains his upcoming FoodLosophy series which outlines the importance of our food choices and their direct correlation to a healthier, leaner, and better feel...
itunes:summary:
Derek is joined by Stacy and Owen to talk about their first jobs they held as teenagers, Derek explains his upcoming FoodLosophy series which outlines the importance of our food choices and their direct correlation to a healthier, leaner, and better feeling body. We look forward to you all being able to reap the benefits of truly taking control of your diet and what you put in your body because that is the most important aspect of overall wellness.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros

description:
Derek is joined by Stacy and Owen to talk about their first jobs they held as teenagers, Derek explains his upcoming FoodLosophy series which outlines the importance of our food choices and their direct correlation to a healthier, leaner, and better feeling body. We look forward to you all being able to reap the benefits of truly taking control of your diet and what you put in your body because that is the most important aspect of overall wellness.
